title: Apps are glitching out when I open them, how do I fix this so I can open them?
content: When I open a majority of my apps, they glitch out allowing me not to be able to access them. Some apps allow me to open them but a pop-up thing comes up saying how the apps not working and stuff. This has been happening for a week and I've tried pausing the app and deleting them. Also tried deleting cache and shutting down my phone. I haven't even been able to open my emails. Please help!
